name: spreadsheet-to-database
author: Thomas Patrick Welborn
description: Converts an XLSX Spreadsheet to a Mongo Database.

scripts.start: pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs && npm run save
scripts.stop: pm2 stop ecosystem.config.cjs && npm run save
scripts.delete: pm2 delete ecosystem.config.cjs && npm run save
scripts.start-photo-application: pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --only photo-application && npm run save
scripts.stop-photo-application: pm2 stop ecosystem.config.cjs --only photo-application && npm run save
scripts.delete-photo-application: pm2 delete ecosystem.config.cjs --only photo-application && npm run save
scripts.start-mvc-framework: pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --only mvc-framework && npm run save
scripts.stop-mvc-framework: pm2 stop ecosystem.config.cjs --only mvc-framework && npm run save
scripts.delete-mvc-framework: pm2 delete ecosystem.config.cjs --only mvc-framework && npm run save
